Title: Relates to an engineering technology degree
Summary: Provides that an applicant with a bachelor's degree or higher in engineering technology and an applicant with a bachelor's degree or higher in engineering shall have the same number of education and experience credit requirements, shall have the same eligibility for an identification card as "an engineer in training", as well as examination and examination eligibility requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to an accredited engineering technology degree
